DOC.brief_summary: Determine effect probiotic improve iron status population healthy , pregnant woman .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Probiotics Iron Status During Pregnancy
DOC.criteria: Healthy , pregnant woman , age 1842 year , singleton gestation Inclusion 1012 week gestation BMI ≥ 18 ≤ 30 baseline Provide sign date informed consent form Willing comply study procedure Serum ferritin level < 20 µg/L Hb < 110 g/L baseline ( visit 1 ) Chronic disease associate anemia Known Thalassemia Hyperemesis gravidarum Chronic gastrointestinal disease ( inflammable bowel disease ; Crohn 's disease , Ulcerative Colitis ; diarrheal disease ) Known gluten intolerance , lactose intolerance , milk protein allergy Taking antibiotic within four week inclusion Blood plasma donation within three ( 3 ) month prior baseline History clinically significant disease disorder , opinion Investigator , may either put subject risk participation study , influence result subject 's ability participate study Smoking use nicotinecontaining product ( currently last three [ 3 ] month ) History alcohol abuse , excessive intake alcohol , judge Investigator Hypersensitivity ingredient study product Any reason exclusion , judge Investigator
